Question.Subject: where can I get a free <or> low cost web site that will allow me to accept payments through paypal?
Question.Content: I want to pay as little as possible, or even free I appreciate all of your answers~ thanks!
Question.ChosenAnswer: www.freewebs.com you can get a free website and through there shop you can set up and the paypal wiget you can do anything. if you need a domain ( you will) go to www.godaddy.com for very low cost domians and even direct it to your website for free. use promo code DN7 and get a .BIZ/.NET/.ORG domain for only $7.49
